result.name: Google Darkest Fusion 2/2 - REPAIR SITE YOU BOTS
result.description: EDIT: SITE NOT WORKING ON FIREFOX UNLESS YOU VISIT SITE VIA https://userstyles.org/categories/site AS WORKAROUND TO USERSTYLES ADMINS - REPAIR SITE: FEEDBACK BUTTON, DISCORD LINK, CONTACTS DETAILS, FIREFOX ISSUES OR JUST CLOSE IT DOWN, YOU ARE RUINING EVERYTHING: https://github.com/uso-archive/data/issues/50 Do you like my style? Please support my work and fund me a coffee (via PayPal to the left of "Install" button). Also share style with your friends. Thank you for being awesome! Darkest Fusion supports almost every Google site. Due to an style size limit Darkest Fusion has been divided into 2 parts. That part contains dark theme for less used Google sites: Developers, Firebase, Docs, Issuetracker, Forms, Flights, Groups, Play, Music, Scholar, Script and Travel. First style is available >>> there <<<
result.notes: If you find issue, describe it accurate please. Provide screen, tell me language/area and browser you are using because often it depends of them. See example. Please don't give thumbs down/OK in comments with small issues. I will fix them as soon as possible. Thank you. Known issues: - you tell me. Additional informations: - on Chrome/Opera Homepage may not work correctly, solution there - In Docs, I can't make exceptions for colorized tables and I can't make 100% dark Sheets because websites code overwrites it Changelog: * 3.4 - 09.10.2023 - fixes to Docs, Forms and Script, *3.3 - 12.08.2023 - fixes to Developers, Docs and Script, * 3.2 - 03.07.2023 - fixes to Docs, Forms, Script and Travel, * 3.1 - 17.05.2023 - fixes to Docs and Travel, * 3.0 - 05.05.2023 - fixes to Docs, Script, Travel, moved Shopping to main theme, * 2.9 - 10.04.2023 - huge amount of fixes to Developers, Docs, Play and Script, * 2.8 - 02.04.2023 - fixes to Docs, Flights, Forms, Groups, Issuetracker and Play, * 2.7 - 26.12.2022 - fixes to Docs, Forms, Groups and Play, * 2.6 - 30.10.2022 - fixes to Forms and Play, * 2.5 - 16.10.2022 - fixes to Firebase, Forms and Play, * 2.4 - 10.08.2022 - disabled always darked Sheets (thx @fgsfdss for info and sorry for delay), fixes to Travel, currently due to bug on userstyles (cannot switch this options) I am unable to make it work correctly :( * 2.3 - 10.07.2022 - fixes to Docs, Forms and rewritten Play from scratch, * 2.2 - 02.05.2022 - fixes to Developers, Forms, Play and Shopping, * 2.1 - 05.09.2021 - fixes to Flights, Hotels and Travel, * 2.0 - 16.08.2021 - very much amount of fixes to Flights and Travel, * 1.9 - 05.07.2021 - many fixes to Script (thx @Erik Johannes Jung for info), * 1.8 - 02.06.2021 - fixes to Play and Docs (thx Jest Tutjest) * 1.7 - 01.05.2021 - very many fixes to Groups, * 1.6 - 30.04.2021 - fixes to Docs, * 1.5 - 03.04.2021 - fixed Google Docs white background (thx @Lindsiria for info!), Scholar and more, changed "Even darker Docs" customizable option to be disabled by Default * 1.4 - 21.02.2021 - added support to Issuetracker, moved Groups to that style 2/2 (due to lack of space on part 1/2), fixes to Docs and Sheets, * 1.31 - 08.02.2021 - fixes to Travel, * 1.3 - 29.12.2020 - HUGE amount of fixes related to Travel and Flights, * 1.2 - 20.12.2020 - again I reached limits on main style 1/2 so moved redesigned Shopping here https://i.imgur.com/AfEuBng.png :( * 1.11 - 18.12.2020 - fixes to Developers and Script (thx @Marobon), * 1.10 - 24.11.2020 - fixes to Docs, Forms, * 1.09 - 08.06.2020 - fixes to Docs-Drive, * 1.08 - 08.06.2020 - fixes to Docs, * 1.07 - 16.07.2020 - fixes to Developers and to Firebase (thx @kldjflkasjdfasdf for info) * 1.06 - 07.05.2020 - fixes to Play, * 1.05 - 11.04.2020 - fixes to Music and Play, * 1.04 - 31.03.2020 - fixes to Forms, * 1.03 - 14.03.2020 - fixed some bugs on Docs (thanks @Nhiet and @Digdown50 for info) * 1.02 - 26.02.2020 - more fixes to Music (again thanks @EriolAncalagon for help), * 1.01 - 24.02.2020 - fixes to Music (thanks @EriolAncalagon for info), * 1.0 - 21.02.2020 - style had been divided into two parts due to a style limit size (and userstyles.org admins doesn't give a f**k on that site - I can't contact with them), first style is available there, also fixes to Docs and Firebase (thx @Kebab Boy, @ngranger.tech and @Idomo for help),
